text: Adelaide Zoo is Australia's second oldest zoo. It is in Adelaide, South Australia. The zoo has over 1800 animals from 300 different species. In 2009, the zoo will be get two Giant Pandas, from China.Rudd gives panda pledge ==Other websites== *Web site of the Adelaide Zoo ==References== Category:Buildings and structures in Australia Category:Organisations based in Adelaide Category:Zoos in Australia
title: Adelaide Zoo
